## Bio

Hi! I'm an Economics PhD student at [UC Berkeley](https://www.econ.berkeley.edu/) interested in mechanism design, market design, industrial organization, and public economics. Previously, I have also worked on various research and policy projects in ecological economics, law & economics, and labor economics.

## Education & Experience

**Research Fellow (Law & Economics)** \| Stanford University \| 2022 - 2024

**B.S. in Mathematics (Honors) & B.A. in Economics (High Honors), *summa cum laude* ** \| Wake Forest University \| 2018 - 2022
